pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Hume AI Python SDK

Integrate Hume APIs directly into your Python application



To get started, [sign up for a Hume account](https://share.hsforms.com/1lVY-gpw0RTaWCeu7ZTkH-wcjsur)!> We're in private beta right now, but we'll be continuously rolling out access to developers and organizations on our waitlist.## Usage & DocumentationFor usage examples check out the [full documentation](https://humeai.github.io/hume-python-sdk/).## Other Resources- [Hume AI Homepage](https://hume.ai)- [Platform Documentation](https://help.hume.ai/basics/about-hume-ai)- [API Reference](https://docs.hume.ai)## CitationsHume's expressive communication platform has been built on top of published scientific research. If you use this SDK in your work please see [CITATIONS.md](CITATIONS.md) for the best way to reference that research.## SupportIf you've found a bug with this SDK please [open an issue](https://github.com/HumeAI/hume-python-sdk/issues/new)!
